pokepicnic_main_error_01:
There’s not much space for your Pokémon.
Doesn’t seem like you can host a picnic...
pokepicnic_main_error_02:
Your things might slide off the table if you try
to have a picnic on a slope like this!
pokepicnic_main_error_03:
There’s not quite enough space to unpack your
Picnic Set and let your Pokémon play freely...
pokepicnic_main_error_04: Probably best not to host a picnic here...
pokepicnic_main_error_05:
Probably best not to host a picnic in a spot
so close to people...
pokepicnic_main_error_06:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Your pal [VAR TRNAME(0001)] is already hosting
a\r
picnic!\r
Head\r
there\r
and\r
join them!
pokepicnic_main_error_07: Seems like you can’t hold a picnic on the water...
pokepicnic_main_error_08: You can’t set up a picnic while riding a Pokémon!
pokepicnic_main_set_01: It’s a Picnic Set! What do you want to do?
pokepicnic_main_yasei_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Whoa! Looks like a wild [VAR PKNAME(0001)]
came\r
to\r
check\r
out\r
your picnic!
pokepicnic_main_yasei_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Seems like the wild [VAR PKNAME(0001)] would
like\r
to\r
stick\r
with you!\r
Will you let it join you on your adventures?
pokepicnic_main_friend_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Do you want to join
[VAR TRNAME(0001)]’s picnic?
pokepicnic_main_friend_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Looks like [VAR TRNAME(0001)] is hosting a
picnic.\r
Want\r
to\r
join in?
pokepicnic_main_friend_04:
You’ve still got company! Are you sure you want
to pack up?
pokepicnic_main_friend_05:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0001)] packed up their Picnic
Set,\r
so\r
that’s\r
it\r
for\r
this picnic!
pokepicnic_main_change_01: What do you want to change up?
pokepicnic_main_change_02: Which tablecloth do you want to put out?
pokepicnic_main_change_03: Which water bottle do you want to set out?
pokepicnic_main_change_04: Which cup do you want to use?
pokepicnic_main_change_06: Do you want to keep making changes?
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_02:
Uh-oh, you’ve run out of picks! You can’t make a
sandwich like this!
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_03:
Oh no, you don’t have enough ingredients to
join in the sandwich making...
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_04:
Someone else is using the table to make
sandwiches now! Let’s wait our turn.
pokepicnic_main_ride_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]There are so many Pokémon playing already that
it seems there isn’t space for\r
[VAR PKNICK(0000)]!
pokepicnic_main_ball_03: Which ball do you want to play with?
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_05: [VAR NUM1(0001)]/[VAR NUM1(0002)] members of your group have joined in!
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_06:
[VAR NUM1(0001)]/[VAR NUM1(0002)] members of your group have joined in!
Waiting for the sandwich prep to be kicked off...
pokepicnic_main_cooking_message_08:
Looks like the food prep has already begun!
You’re too late to join in this time.
pokepicnic_main_tamago_02:
There’s a Pokémon Egg inside! Do you want to
take it?
pokepicnic_main_tamago_03:
In that case, the Egg will be sent to the academy
for someone else to care for. Is that OK?
pokepicnic_main_tamago_04: The Egg was sent to the academy!
pokepicnic_main_tamago_06:
Your Boxes are already full, so the Egg was
donated to the academy.
pokepicnic_main_tamago_07: ...Oh? There’s still something else in the basket!
pokepicnic_main_tamago_08:
There was [VAR iCOLOR2(0001,0000)][VAR sTRBAG(0001)]
in the basket!
pokepicnic_main_tamago_09:
Doesn’t look like there’s anything more in the
basket right now.
pokepicnic_main_tamago_10:
Doesn’t look like there’s anything in the basket
so far...
